availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elliot [Unknown] (Daviess County, Kentucky, enslaved person and fugitive)

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, enslaved person and fugitive. Enslaved by Willis Field in 1862. Accused of murdering Willis Field in 1862. Fugitive in Indiana in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 388A.
History of Daviess County, Kentucky Indexed by Thomas Humphrey (Utica, KY: McDowell Publications, 1980), 301.
"Brutal Murder," The Evansville Daily Journal, (Evansville, Indiana), December 3, 1862, p. 2.
KYR-0001-029-0307.
KYR-0001-033-0033.
